subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football (College)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Along with the sanctions against Penn State, the N.C.A.A. granted current players and incoming freshmen the right to transfer, without being blocked and without having to sit out a year.
snippet: Along with the sanctions against Penn State, the N.C.A.A. granted current players and incoming freshmen the right to transfer, without being blocked and without having to sit out a year.
